name: Klishe's Mansion
description:
You're just a random salaryman driving at midnight, then suddenly your car has broken down in the woods, but lucky for you, you've stopped in front of a random mansion, what could go wrong?

Controls:
  • Arrows - Move
  • Z - Action
  • X - Cancel / run
  • C - Open inventory
  • Esc - Pause
Tools used:
  • Godot
  • Piskel
  • Inkscape
  • Audacity

You can find the source code in my Github page.
